name: Darxanadon
description:
Synopsis:


Demons have risen from above and below. Monsters eat humans and digest them into their greatest fears. A hero awakens from afar.

Explore a massive interconnected labyrinth of grottos, castles, and groves in this 2D retro-inspired Action RPG.

Features:


  • Massive Interconnected World
  • Tons of bosses and enemies
  • Useful Items that change player appearance
  • Tons of optional content, multiple paths to beat the game.
  • Fighter, Archer, Magician playstyles
  • Awesome Soundtrack
  • Great challenge to those with an adventurer's mindset
